column1: Azuregos's Magical Ledger^60^All^Azshara^Magical Ledger^Narain Soothfancy^Azuregos's Magical Ledger^The Charge of the Dragonflights^^Deliver Azuregos's Magical Ledger to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.^You cannot understand a single word on this ledger. You don't even know what language it is written in!
Stewvul
column2: Ex-B.F.F.^60^All^Tanaris^Narain Soothfancy^Inconspicuous Crate^Stewvul
column3: Ex-B.F.F.^Translating the Ledger^^Narain Soothfancy wants you to find his ex-best friend forever (BFF)
column4: Stewvul
column5: and take back the scrying goggles that Stewvul stole from him.^If I am to translate anything
column6: I will need my scrying goggles. Unfortunately
column7: those were stolen quite some time ago by my ex-best friend forever
column8: Stewvul. He broke my heart in five places and then left me here to rot. With the help of my trusty crystal ball
column9: I've isolated his whereabouts to either the Greymane Wall in Silverpine or what appears to be a portal world in the Outland that is currently being overrun by the Burning Legion. You're going to have to track him down and get my goggles back
column10: <name>!

column1: Scrying Goggles? No Problem!^60^All^Molten Core^Inconspicuous Crate^Narain Soothfancy^Stewvul
column2: Ex-B.F.F.^^The Good News and The Bad News^Find Narain's Scrying Goggles and return them to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.^<You hear a sigh of relief escape the crate.> You just want his scrying goggles? Great! That will be no problem... Just give me a minute to... Hey! Where the... Dagnabbit! Well
column3: there's some bad news and some worse news. The bad news is that I lost the goggles. The worse news is that I lost them when I was nosing around in the Molten Core last month. Yep
column4: the Molten Core... I guess that concludes our business! Bye!

column1: The Horde Needs Firebloom!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Batrider Pele'keiki^Batrider Pele'keiki^^^The Horde Needs More Firebloom!^Bring 20 Firebloom to Batrider Pele'keiki at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^Hey
column2: <class>. Ya you
column3: mon! There be a whole mess of firebloom the Horde thinkin' they need for this Ahn'Qiraj war effort. Maybe they put it in nice things that go boom? Maybe they give it to the Alliance as fuel for their steam tanks? Who knows? Not Pele'keiki! Pele'keiki know this though... he know you gonna help him out and bring back lots of the firebloom
column4: right
column5: mon?

column1: The Horde Needs Purple Lotus!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Apothecary Jezel^Apothecary Jezel^^^The Horde Needs More Purple Lotus!^Bring 20 Purple Lotus to Apothecary Jezel at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^The purple lotus
column2: <class>
column3: is a reagent in a great many potions
column4: elixirs and oils
column5: some of which will be of use to us at Ahn'Qiraj. We're going to need to create an immense number of those potions for the war effort. And I'm going to experiment to find more uses for the lotus as well. But to do all of that I'm going to need a great quantity of the flower. That's where you come in. Go out into the field and collect up as many purple lotuses as you can. Is this something that you are willing to do for us?

column1: Never Ask Me About My Business^60^All^Tanaris^Narain Soothfancy^Dirge Quikcleave^Never Ask Me About My Business^Translating the Ledger^^Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to speak with Dirge Quikcleave in Gadgetzan.^If there is one thing that you should know about me
column2: it is this: NEVER ask me about my business! I work with things you simply cannot understand. Like for example: Do you know what a psychotronic muzzledorf is? Of course you don't! And that's why we leave the planning to me and the fetching to you. As I said earlier
column3: if this is going to work
column4: we're going to need a 500 pound chicken. Head to Gadgetzan and speak with Dirge Quikcleave - he'll get you started on finding a suitable specimen.

column1: The Isle of Dread!^60^All^Tanaris^Dirge Quikcleave^Dirge Quikcleave^Never Ask Me About My Business^^^Recover Lakmaeran's Carcass and 20 Chimaerok Tenderloins for Dirge Quikcleave in Tanaris.^Legend has it that the chimaerok of the Isle of Dread in Feralas have the most succulent and tender vittles in existence! Now these chimaerok also have a daddy who
column2: with proper preparation
column3: may or may not look like a 500 pound chicken. Head to the Isle of Dread and kill Lord Lakmaeran and bring me his fresh carcass. That should satisfy the gnome. To satisfy me
column4: you'll need to get your hands on some chimaerok tenderloin. Do this and you'll have your 500 pound chicken and a little something extra.

column1: Dirge's Kickin' Chimaerok Chops^60^All^Tanaris^Dirge Quikcleave^Dirge Quikcleave^Never Ask Me About My Business^^^Dirge Quikcleave in Gadgetzan wants you to bring him 20 Goblin Rocket Fuel and 20 Deeprock Salt.^My recipe is complete! What I need from you now is some rocket fuel and deeprock salt. I'll handle the spices and the meat you brought me will cover the rest. After you bring me what I asked for
column2: the chicken will be ready to take back to Narain.

column1: Return to Narain^60^All^Tanaris^Dirge Quikcleave^Narain Soothfancy^Never Ask Me About My Business^^The Good News and The Bad News^Deliver the 500 Pound Chicken to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.^I'm a goblin of my word
column2: kid. Here's your 500 pound chicken. What a gnome wants with a 500 pound chicken
column3: I'll never know... <Dirge grumbles something unintelligible.> Probably to sleep in it... Dirty gnomes...

column1: The Horde Needs Heavy Leather!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Skinner Jamani^Skinner Jamani^^^The Horde Needs More Heavy Leather!^Bring 10 Heavy Leather to Skinner Jamani at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^Since we're preparing for war
column2: it might be best if we get all of the goods we need first
column3: don't you think
column4: mon? One of the staples of the war materiel that we're producing is heavy leather. We'll use it for just about everything
column5: from reinforcement to armor
column6: and good old plain tarps too. But first we need to get our hands on more of it. That's your job
column7: <class>. Sharpen your knife and bring me back a bundle. Then we'll talk further.

column1: The Horde Needs Thick Leather!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Sergeant Umala^Sergeant Umala^^^The Horde Needs More Thick Leather!^Bring 10 Thick Leather to Sergeant Umala at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^I'm glad that you decided to speak to me about this
column2: <class>. It looks like the Horde's preparations for the upcoming Ahn'Qiraj War are in full swing. But you and I still need to do our part. I've been asked to collect a great number of thick leather skins for use in all manner of war materiel
column3: and I need you to help me by going out there and gathering them up. There's honor and the gratitude of the Horde in it for you should you decide to help. Will you?

column1: Tiara of the Oracle^60^All^Priest^Andorgos^Andorgos^^^^Bring Vek'nilash's Circlet
column2: 2 Idols of the Sage
column3: 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.^The Twin Emperors... their incessant whispers are slowly taking a toll on my sanity. They mock me
column4: knowing I cannot step further into their domain to save my brother Arygos. In my visions I see their monstrous faces adorned by powerful crowns. But I will have my revenge... I will transmute these symbols of Qiraji power to ones better suited to our needs. Bring me the components I require
column5: <name>. I will give you a headpiece of unmatched power.

column1: Trousers of the Oracle^60^All^Priest^Kandrostrasz^Kandrostrasz^^^^Bring Ouro's Intact Hide
column2: 2 Idols of Life
column3: 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Kandrostrasz inside Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.^You seek to prove your worth to my kind
column4: mortal? Very well
column5: perhaps we can be of mutual assistance. The ancient sandworm
column6: Ouro
column7: is a being of legendary power. He is rumored to have been created by the Old God himself as a mockery of life. His skin is unnatural... thick
column8: nearly impregnable
column9: yet it's flexible and allows him to move with the speed and grace of a much smaller creature. Bring me a sample of his skin along with other minor components and I shall craft you leggings of great power.

column1: Mantle of the Oracle^60^All^Priest^Andorgos^Andorgos^^^^Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command
column2: 2 Idols of Rebirth
column3: 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Neutral reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.^It is said among us that the ornate shoulder armor worn by the mortal races started as an attempt to emulate the wings of a dragon. Bring me the bindings worn by the highest Qiraji leaders and I shall shape them into a set of pauldrons more dreadful than even the wings of Nefarian himself!

column1: Footwraps of the Oracle^60^All^Priest^Kandrostrasz^Kandrostrasz^^^^Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command

column3: 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Gold Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj. This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.^Qiraji magic is strong and ancient. The most powerful qiraji wield items of such might
column4: they'd give pause even to a dragon. Bring me the qiraji bindings of command and other minor components by and I'll create a set of powerful boots for you. You will find them useful in the fight against the enemy.

column1: Draconic for Dummies^60^All^Tanaris^Narain Soothfancy^Freshly Dug Dirt^Draconic for Dummies^Translating the Ledger^^Find Narain Soothfancy's book
column2: buried on an island in the South Seas.^I knew that book would come in handy some day! Thankfully
column3: I had the wit and foresight to stow it somewhere safe. Don't worry
column4: it's in a place that nobody could ever hope to find it! I needed a gyrocopter just to get there the first time. Unfortunately I crashed it on the beach on my way back. It was through that accident that I gained these super-gnomish psychic powers! Look for my crashed gyrocopter somewhere on Land's End Beach and swim south from there! You'll know the spot when you see it!

column1: rAnS0m^60^All^Tanaris^Freshly Dug Dirt^Narain Soothfancy^Draconic for Dummies^^^Return the Ransom Letter to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.^<The text on this note is made up of various typefaces glued onto the parchment's surface.> We've got your precious book
column2: gnome. If you ever want to see it again
column3: you'll do exactly as we ask. <A detailed set of instructions is listed
column4: spanning 3 pages.> Bring the money and come alone!

column1: Love Song for Narain^60^All^Tanaris^Meridith the Mermaiden^Narain Soothfancy^^^^Take Meridith's Love Letter to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.^It isn't often that I get visitors. As a matter of fact
column2: the last time I had a visitor was when I rescued that dear
column3: sweet gnome from the wreckage of the crashed flying machine. <Meridith gazes into nothingness
column4: lost in a memory.> Do you know him? Narain? Narain Soothfancy? Oh it would mean so much to me if somebody would deliver a message to him for me. I must tell him how I feel! I know it's love! I just know it! Could you possibly deliver a message to Narain? I would be forever indebted to you!

column1: The Horde Needs Rugged Leather!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Doctor Serratus^Doctor Serratus^^^The Horde Needs More Rugged Leather!^Bring 10 Rugged Leather to Doctor Serratus at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^I find that the fit of the knife in your palm is more important than the edge on it. Even the dullest blade can be made to cut if pressure is being properly applied through it
column2: wouldn't you agree
column3: <class>? But you and I don't have such problems as we maintain the sharpest of edges
column4: yes? Well
column5: no matter
column6: I have a task for you. In service to the Horde
column7: and to do your part for the Ahn'Qiraj war effort
column8: I want you to return to me with a number of rugged leather skins. This is something that you will do
column9: no?

column4: he will lash out against all living beings with terrible wrath. You must find him before then and find a way to bring his existence to an end. Do this and bring me a piece of his husk. I shall grant you armor no mortal has ever worn... armor fit for one who has slain a god!

column1: The Horde Needs Wool Bandages!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Healer Longrunner^Healer Longrunner^^^The Horde Needs More Wool Bandages!^Bring 20 Wool Bandages to Healer Longrunner at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^Greetings
column2: <class>. In preparation for the war at Ahn'Qiraj
column3: I am here coordinating the Horde's efforts at gathering wool bandages. Unfortunately
column4: out in the field
column5: our soldiers cannot afford to rely upon the presence of a healer to keep them alive. Trust me
column6: I know first hand. Thus
column7: we're putting together all of these first aid kits for them. If you have the time
column8: I need many wool bandages. Return them to me here and I will see to it that you are properly rewarded.

column1: Decoy!^60^All^Tanaris^Narain Soothfancy^Narain Soothfancy^Draconic for Dummies^^^Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to travel to Winterspring and place the Bag of Gold at the drop off point documented by the booknappers.^I've got it! Here's what we're going to do. I'm going to fill a sack up with rocks and you're going to make the drop. I know it said that I should make the delivery and I'm going to - sort of. <Narain looks you up and down.> Yes
column2: you will do just fine. Take this turban
column3: robe
column4: and sack of rocks and head to the drop off point in Winterspring. I've included everything you need in this special kit. When they show up to pick up the goods
column5: snuff them out! That will teach them to mess with Narain!

column1: The Horde Needs Mageweave Bandages!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Lady Callow^Lady Callow^^^The Horde Needs More Mageweave Bandages!^Bring 20 Mageweave Bandages to Lady Callow at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^I trust that you are speaking to me because you are going to help with the collection I have been entrusted to? Good! By whatever means
column2: and I do mean whatever
column3: I wish for you to gather up a good number of mageweave bandages. Fresh would be nice
column4: but not absolutely necessary. Return them to me here
column5: <class>
column6: and I will personally see to it that you are properly rewarded.

column1: The Horde Needs Runecloth Bandages!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Stoneguard Clayhoof^Stoneguard Clayhoof^^^The Horde Needs More Runecloth Bandages!^Bring 20 Runecloth Bandages to Stoneguard Clayhoof at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^It appears inevitable that the Horde and Alliance are on a collision course for war at Ahn'Qiraj. Surprisingly
column2: it is not a war with each other
column3: but rather with the silithid
column4: and whatever force controls them. Also surprisingly
column5: both sides are doing their part to gather the resources necessary to wage a successful war. I am collecting runecloth bandages to distribute to the soldiers
column6: but I won't be successful without assistance
column7: hopefully yours. Is this something that you can aid me with
column8: <class>?

column1: The Horde Needs Lean Wolf Steaks!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Bloodguard Rawtar^Bloodguard Rawtar^^^The Horde Needs More Lean Wolf Steaks!^Bring 20 Lean Wolf Steaks to Bloodguard Rawtar at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^I'm not standing here just to get a nice tan
column2: <class>. There are war preparations to be made. If we're going to crush those bugs at Ahn'Qiraj then we need to be ready
column3: and that includes food too! They have me gathering and salting lean wolf steaks here for the upcoming war. But since I need to stay here to take care of all of this
column4: I need you to go out
column5: kill some wolves and then cook up the meat into lean wolf steaks and bring them back to me here. You got all that?

column1: The Horde Needs Spotted Yellowtail!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Fisherman Lin'do^Fisherman Lin'do^^^The Horde Needs More Spotted Yellowtail!^Bring 20 Spotted Yellowtail to Fisherman Lin'do at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^It be a nice day for fishin'
column2: don't'cha think mon? Good thing
column3: cuz I be needin' a lot of fish it lookin' like. The Horde
column4: they askin' me to be in charge of collectin' a ton of the spotted yellowtail for them. They say they needin' it for the war they getting' ready for at Ahn'Qiraj. I say to them I do the best I can. So I be needin' to get some help. You gonna be helpin' me
column5: <class>?

column1: The Horde Needs Baked Salmon!^60^All^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Chief Sharpclaw^Chief Sharpclaw^^^The Horde Needs More Baked Salmon!^Bring 20 Baked Salmon to Chief Sharpclaw at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.^The Ahn'Qiraj war effort is an immense undertaking
column2: <class>. All of the materials being gathered here
column3: whether it is metal for weapons
column4: or food to eat
column5: are all as important as the other. For
column6: if you haven't eaten in days you will not have the strength to lift your axe when it matters. Thus
column7: we gather what food we can. I am collecting baked salmon
column8: a dish that was chosen both for its sustenance and its ability to keep well. Can you aid me with this task
column9: <class>?

column1: The Only Prescription^60^All^Tanaris^Narain Soothfancy^Narain Soothfancy^Draconic for Dummies^^The Good News and The Bad News^Recover the 8 lost chapters of Draconic for Dummies and combine them with the Magical Book Binding and return the completed book of Draconic for Dummies: Volume II to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.^I should have known. column7: use this magical binding to put them back together and return to me.

column1: The Good News and The Bad News^60^All^Tanaris^Narain Soothfancy^Narain Soothfancy^The Good News and The Bad News^Scrying Goggles? No Problem!
column2: Return to Narain
column3: The Only Prescription^^Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to bring him 20 Arcanite Bars
column4: 10 Elementium Ore
column5: 10 Azerothian Diamonds
column6: and 10 Blue Sapphires.^Well that took a little longer than expected. Now let me see what this ledger says. <Narain silently reads the ledger
column7: periodically mumbling under his breath.> The good news is that I am 99% certain that I am capable of creating an arcanite buoy that will function to your specifications. This is
column8: of course
column9: wholly dependant on the bad news. The bad news is that I'm going to need a lot of arcanite
column10: elementium ore
column11: and rare gemstones. Bring me what I need and I will craft the buoy.

column1: The Wrath of Neptulon^60^All^Azshara^Narain Soothfancy^Anachronos^The Good News and The Bad News^^The Might of Kalimdor^Use the Arcanite Buoy at the Swirling Maelstrom at the Bay of Storms in Azshara.^Did I mention the bad news yet? Its name is Maws: 100 feet of death and destruction. I guess I may have forgotten that little tidbit. According to my superior psycho-psionic clairvoyance
column2: you'll find that the best spot to cast this buoy is off the coast of Azshara
column3: in the Bay of Storms. Look for a swirling maelstrom
column4: most likely cluttered with wreckage. By the by
column5: I hope you have friends. Now if you somehow miraculously succeed
column6: take the scepter shard to Anachronos.

column1: Nefarius's Corruption^60^All^Blackwing Lair^Vaelastrasz the Corrupt^Anachronos^^The Charge of the Dragonflights^The Might of Kalimdor^Slay Nefarian and recover the Red Scepter Shard. Return the Red Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris. You have 5 hours to complete this task.^Champion
column2: is it you? A thousand years it has been since I was entrusted the shard and it is at my darkest hour that one should rise to relieve me of it... But what would tragedy be without cruelty? <Vaelastrasz coughs weakly.> Ne... Nefarius now holds the scepter shard. Time is of the essence. Nefarius plans to destroy the shard. You must hurry!

column1: Field Duty^60^Horde^Silithus^Windcaller Kaldon^Windcaller Kaldon^^^^Report to Krug Skullsplit at the Orgrimmar Legion post in front of Hive'Regal. Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers
column2: obtain Signed Field Duty Papers and bring them to Windcaller Kaldon in Cenarion Hold.^Greetings
column3: <name>. Before I assign you to more involved tasks in the war
column4: you'll need to do your share of field duty. You will find Captain Skullsplit's Orgrimmar Legion outside Hive'Regal. Report to him and come back to me with proof of your field service. I shall have a more advanced assignment ready for you. Oh
column5: please do your best to stay away from the Ironforge Brigade. Tensions are high among our Alliance and Horde volunteers.

column1: Eranikus
column2: Tyrant of the Dream^60^All^Teldrassil^Malfurion Stormrage^Forest Wisp^Eranikus
column3: Tyrant of the Dream^The Charge of the Dragonflights^^Travel to the continent of Teldrassil and find Malfurion's agent somewhere outside the walls of Darnassus.^This is a journey of redemption
column4: hero. Would it be that I was slain today
column5: I would have died for a just and righteous cause. You must recover the green scepter shard. You must cleanse Eranikus of the taint placed upon him by the Old Gods. Travel to Darnassus. Just outside the city walls you will find one of my agents. This agent will set things in motion for us and inform Tyrande of our plans without alerting Staghelm. <Malfurion sighs.> A fall from grace a thousand years in the making...

column1: Tyrande and Remulos^60^All^Teldrassil^Forest Wisp^Keeper Remulos^Eranikus
column2: Tyrant of the Dream^^^Travel to the Moonglade and speak to Keeper Remulos.^Tyrande will be notifed
column3: mortal. Shan'do Stormrage has prepared me for this contingency. Now you must venture to the Moonglade and speak with Remulos. He will have further instruction as to the summoning of Eranikus. We all wish you great luck.

column1: The Nightmare's Corruption^60^All^Moonglade^Keeper Remulos^Keeper Remulos^Eranikus
column2: Tyrant of the Dream^^^Travel to the four Emerald Dream portals in Azeroth and collect a Fragment of the Nightmare's Corruption from each. Return to Keeper Remulos in the Moonglade when you have completed this task.^You must travel to the four dream portals of Azeroth. From each you must draw a fragment of the Nightmare's corruption. The dragonkin that inhabit these areas will hold such fragments. Return to me when you have gathered these fragments.

column1: The Nightmare Manifests^60^All^Moonglade^Keeper Remulos^Keeper Remulos^Eranikus
column2: Tyrant of the Dream^^^Defend Nighthaven from Eranikus. Do not let Keeper Remulos perish. Do not slay Eranikus. Defend yourself. Await Tyrande.^We must use restraint against Eranikus. We are to redeem him not destroy him. Tyrande is already en route to assist us in this task. We must weather the dragon's blows and save Nighthaven from certain destruction. Be on guard! You and your allies are our only hope.

column1: Azure Templar^60^All^Silithus^Tactical Task Briefing I^Bor Wildmane^^^^Summon and slay an Azure Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold. You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.^The Twilight's Hammer and the elemental nobles they worship present a formidable threat to our operations in Silithus. With the new enemies we're facing inside Ahn'Qiraj
column2: we cannot afford to lower our guard to our enemies outside. Find a way to summon and destroy an Azure Templar and report to Bor Wildmane.

column1: Hive'Regal Scout Report^60^All^Silithus^Tactical Task Briefing VII^Windcaller Proudhorn^^^^Contact Cenarion Scout Landion inside Hive'Regal and return the Hive'Regal Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold. You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.^We've sent our best scouts deep into the silithid hives to gather intelligence. Scout Landion has been watching the silithid movements at Hive'Regal for several days now. Find him and obtain a written report. We need to be able to act on that information as soon as possible
column2: <name>.

column1: Hive'Ashi Scout Report^60^All^Silithus^Tactical Task Briefing VIII^Windcaller Proudhorn^^^^Contact Cenarion Scout Jalia inside Hive'Ashi and return the Hive'Ashi Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold. Scout Jalia has been watching the silithid movements at Hive'Ashi for several days now. Find her and obtain a written report. We need to be able to act on that information as soon as possible
column2: <name>.

column1: Twilight Marauders^60^All^Silithus^Tactical Task Briefing IX^Windcaller Proudhorn^^^^Slay Twilight Marauder Morna and 2 Twilight Marauders. You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.^Bands of mounted Twilight's Hammer cultists have been spotted riding outside the reach of our forces in Cenarion Hold
column2: picking off our smaller patrols and caravans. Find and defeat the twilight marauders along with their leader
column3: a terrible warrior by the name of Morna. Report to Windcaller Proudhorn after completing the task.

column2: the silithid presence in the area presents an ever increasing threat to our operations. You've been selected to partake on an assault on Hive'Ashi where your primary target will consist of Hive'Ashi defenders. Report back to Commander Mar'alith after your task is completed.

column1: The Ironforge Brigade Needs Explosives!^60^Alliance^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing IV^Arcanist Nozzlespring^^^^Bring 6 Oils of Immolation
column2: 5 Goblin Rocket Fuel and 10 Dense Blasting Powder to Arcanist Nozzlespring near Hive'Zora in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.^The Ironforge Brigade has put in an unusual request for highly... volatile... components. Gather them and bring them to Mr. Nozzlespring from the Ironforge Brigade.

column1: Scrying Materials^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing V^Geologist Larksbane^^^^Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard
column2: 1 Large Radiant Shard and 1 Huge Emerald to Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.^Geologist Larksbane's studies have proven to be of tremendous value to our operations in Silithus. She has recently requested scrying materials to be used in her research. Please gather these materials and deliver them to her directly so that she may continue her research.

column1: Armor Kits for the Field^60^Alliance^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing VII^Janela Stouthammer^^^^Bring 8 Rugged Armor Kits and 8 Heavy Armor Kits to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade Outpost near Hive'Zora in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.^The Ironforge Brigade's supply of armor kits in the battlefield is running dangerously low. Obtain a batch and deliver them to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade's outpost outside Hive'Zora.

Arms for the Field^60^Alliance^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing VI^Janela Stouthammer^^^^Bring 2 Moonsteel Broadswords to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade Outpost outside of Hive'Zora. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.^The Ironforge Brigade has been a worthy ally in our fight in Silithus. Unfortunately
column2: many of their supplies were lost on their way here. Procure a batch of weapons and deliver them to Janela Stouthammer near Hive'Zora.

column1: Uniform Supplies^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing VIII^Windcaller Proudhorn^^^^Bring 1 Mooncloth
column2: 2 Bolts of Runecloth and 1 Ironweb Spider Silk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.^The latest influx of volunteers has caused a shortage of uniforms. Procure a batch of uniform materials and bring them to Windcaller Proudhorn.

column1: Extraordinary Materials^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing IX^Vargus^^^^Bring 2 Enchanted Thorium Bars and 2 Enchanted Leather to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.^Vargus
column2: Cenarion Hold's blacksmith
column3: has requested enchanted materials to be used in the crafting of powerful weapons for our forces. Obtain these and bring them directly to Vargus so that Cenarion Hold's troops may continue to be well equipped.

column1: Secrets of the Qiraji^60^All^Temple of Ahn'Qiraj^Ancient Qiraji Artifact^Andorgos^^^^Take the Ancient Qiraji Artifact to the dragons hiding near the entrance of the temple.^You have discovered an ancient Qiraji artifact! Perhaps one of the dragons near the entrance of the temple would have a use for this relic.
The Orgrimmar Legion Needs Mojo!^60^Horde^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing IV^Shadow Priestess Shai^^^^Bring 6 Powerful Mojo
column2: 6 Flasks of Big Mojo and 8 Oils of Immolation to Shadow Priestess Shai near Hive'Regal in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.^The Orgrimmar Legion has put in a request for several unusual ingredients. Given their current performance in Silithus
column3: we'd like to comply with their request as soon as possible. Gather the materials and bring them to the troll called Shai.

column1: Arms for the Field^60^Horde^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing VI^Merok Longstride^^^^Bring 3 Massive Iron Axes to Merok Longstride at the Orgrimmar Legion camp outside of Hive'Regal. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.^The Orgrimmar Legion has put in a request for additional weapons that we haven't been able to provide at the moment. Obtain the weapons they've requested and bring them to Merok Longstride outside of Hive'Regal.

Armor Kits for the Field^60^Horde^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing VII^Merok Longstride^^^^Bring 8 Rugged Armor Kits and 8 Heavy Armor Kits to Merok Longstride near Hive'Regal. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.^The brave volunteers of the Orgrimmar Legion have arrived to Silithus to aid us in our cause. Their supplies of armor kits were somehow lost in the trip. Obtain a batch of armor kits and deliver them to Merok Longstride at the location of the Orgrimmar Legion camp.

Imperial Qiraji Armaments^60^All^Temple of Ahn'Qiraj^Arygos^Arygos^^^^Arygos in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj will create Elementium Infused Armaments for you should you bring him Imperial Qiraji Armaments and 3 Elementium Ore.^We have not sat idly by for a millennium
column2: <name>. We have watched these beasts feast on their own when they have exhausted their utility. We have listened as they have plotted and schemed to destroy our world. And we have learned of their own internal treachery. Weaknesses exist and we know how to use those weaknesses to our advantage. Find and bring me their ceremonial armaments: Combined with the element created from the volatility of their own God
column3: they will become a force of reckoning.

column1: Imperial Qiraji Regalia^60^All^Temple of Ahn'Qiraj^Merithra of the Dream^Merithra of the Dream^^^^Merithra of the Dream in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj will create Elementium Infused Armaments for you should you bring her Imperial Qiraji Regalia and 3 Elementium Ore.^Arygos theorizes that the element which is born of conflicts between the Old Gods and their minions is also extremely deadly to them under the right conditions. I speak of Elementium
column2: mortal. Find and bring me Imperial Qiraji Regalia and the toxic element and I shall infuse weapons of great power.

column1: The Fall of Ossirian^60^All^Ruins of Ahn'Qiraj^Head of Ossirian the Unscarred^Commander Mar'alith^^^^Deliver the Head of Ossirian the Unscarred to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.^A terrible menace has been laid to rest. The cruel Ossirian has been vanquished. The denizens of Kalimdor would be relieved to know of this victory. Take Ossirian's head and present it to Commander Mar'alith of Cenarion Hold.
The Horde Needs Your Help!^60^Horde^Ahn'Qiraj War Effort^Senior Sergeant Taiga^Warlord Gorchuk^^^^Speak with Warlord Gorchuk in Orgrimmar's Valley of Spirits.^Hello
column2: I'm glad that you've decided to hear me out. The Horde needs all of the help that it can get to prepare for the Ahn'Qiraj War
column3: and that means that we need you! Even now as we speak
column4: official collectors are gathering the necessary material needed for the upcoming war
column5: but we won't be able to meet our goals without your assistance
column6: <name>! You should go speak with the guy in charge
column7: Warlord Gorchuk. What do you say
column8: <class>? Will you help out with the vital preparations?

column2: Veteran's Battlegear
column3: Champion's Battlegear
column4: Stalwart's Battlegear^Talk to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.^As you complete the tasks you're assigned in the war you'll want to talk to Vargus
column5: the blacksmith. Show him any badges you've earned along the way. He'll provide you with gear to match your level of commitment to our cause.

column1: C'Thun's Legacy^60^All^Temple of Ahn'Qiraj^Eye of C'Thun^Caelestrasz^C'Thun's Legacy^^^Take the Eye of C'Thun to Caelastrasz in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj.^The walls of Ahn'Qiraj tremble. A force of evil
column2: older than the world itself
column3: has been destroyed. As you look at the remnants of the colossal abomination your heart nearly freezes. Even in death you can feel the legacy of C'Thun's evil around you. You have done what was thought to be impossible. You grab at an eye stalk of the fiend
column4: stowing it safely in your pack. Take the Eye of C'Thun to the dragons in the next chamber.

column1: The Savior of Kalimdor^60^All^Temple of Ahn'Qiraj^Caelestrasz^Anachronos^C'Thun's Legacy^^^Take the Eye of C'Thun to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time.^To the Caverns of Time you go
column2: <Lord/Lady> <name>. Anachronos awaits your return. Give him the eye of C'Thun as he will undoubtedly wish to place it in his master's collection.

column1: Desert Survival Kits^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing I^Calandrath^^^^Bring 4 Globes of Water
column2: 4 Powerful Anti-Venom and 4 Smoked Desert Dumplings to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.^With the arrival of fresh recruits to Cenarion Hold comes the problem of keeping them alive in the desert. Dehydration as well as numerous poisonous creatures present a serious threat to inexperienced volunteers. Gather the supplies necessary for a desert survival kit and bring them to Calandrath in Cenarion Hold.

column1: Boots for the Guard^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing II^Vish Kozus^^^^Bring 3 Ornate Mithril Boots to Vish Kozus
column2: Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.^The mounted division of the Cenarion Hold guard is in short supply of ornate mithril boots. Procure a batch and deliver them immediately to Captain Vish Kozus in Cenarion Hold.

column1: Grinding Stones for the Guard^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing III^Vish Kozus^^^^Bring 10 Dense Grinding Stones
column2: 10 Solid Grinding Stones and 10 Heavy Grinding Stones to Vish Kozus
column3: Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.^The Cenarion Hold guard is in short supply of grinding stones. Procure a batch and deliver them immediately to Captain Vish Kozus in Cenarion Hold.

column1: Scrying Materials^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing V^Geologist Larksbane^^^^Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard
column2: 1 Large Radiant Shard and 1 Huge Emerald to Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.^Geologist Larksbane's studies have proven to be of tremendous value to our operations in Silithus. She has recently requested scrying materials to be used in her research. Please gather these materials and deliver them to her directly so that she may continue her research.

column1: Uniform Supplies^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing VIII^Windcaller Proudhorn^^^^Bring 1 Mooncloth
column2: 2 Bolts of Runecloth and 1 Ironweb Spider Silk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.^The latest influx of volunteers has caused a shortage of uniforms. Procure a batch of uniform materials and bring them to Windcaller Proudhorn.

column1: Extraordinary Materials^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing IX^Vargus^^^^Bring 2 Enchanted Thorium Bars and 2 Enchanted Leather to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.^Vargus
column2: Cenarion Hold's blacksmith
column3: has requested enchanted materials to be used in the crafting of powerful weapons for our forces. Obtain these and bring them directly to Vargus so that Cenarion Hold's troops may continue to be well equipped.

column1: Bandages for the Field^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing X^Windcaller Proudhorn^^^^Bring 30 Heavy Runecloth Bandages
column2: 30 Heavy Silk Bandages and 30 Heavy Mageweave Bandages to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.^Our supply of bandages in the battlefield is running dangerously low after the recent casualties we have incurred. Obtain a batch of first-aid supplies and deliver them to Windcaller Proudhorn in Cenarion Hold.

column1: The Ultimate Deception^60^All^Silithus^Logistics Task Briefing XI^Aurel Goldleaf^^^^Bring a Skin of Shadow
column2: 3 Frayed Abomination Stitchings and 1 Twilight Cultist Robe to Aurel Goldleaf at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing XI in order to complete this quest.^The Twilight's Hammer operates through innumerable layers of secrecy and deceit. While their actions are carried out in our world
column3: they are planned in a place we have not yet been able to reach. We've come to believe that the stones the Twilight's Hammer uses to summon their superiors allow for two-way transportation. To attempt to use them in this manner
column4: we must replicate - to every last detail - a twilight emissary's robe. Gather the necessary materials and bring them to Aurel Goldleaf
column5: <name>.

column1: Secrets of the Colossus - Ashi^60^All^Silithus^Colossus Researcher Nestor^Oglethorpe Obnoticus^^^^Take the Colossus of Ashi's Husk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.^I'm looking for battle hardened adventurers willing and able to get a fresh husk sample from the fallen Colossus of Ashi to Oglethorpe in Booty Bay. No
column2: no
column3: I wouldn't want you to go anywhere near that thing's corpse. Just take one of my samples and make it snappy. These things are no good to him rotten!

column1: Secrets of the Colossus - Regal^60^All^Silithus^Colossus Researcher Eazel^Overseer Oilfist^^^^Take the Colossus of Regal's Husk to Overseer Oilfist in Searing Gorge.^There ain't nothin' I'd like more than to stuff this bug husk down Oilfist's fat face... Cept
column2: I'm stuck here collectin' samples from that overgrown cockroach. I'll be here 'till the wee mornin' hours given the size o' that thing. Take this here sample to Oilfist fer me and do it fast
column3: <class>. He's payin' BIG! Yar
column4: Thorium Point - it be in the Searin' Gorge.

column1: Secrets of the Colossus - Zora^60^All^Silithus^Colossus Researcher Sophia^Lord Maxwell Tyrosus^^^^Take the Colossus of Zora's Husk to Lord Maxwell Tyrosus at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.^My servants were nearly killed in their efforts to recover this sample. You absolutely must hurry! Lord Maxwell Tyrosus eagerly awaits a fresh husk sample. He believes that the secrets of this Colossus could help us in the war against the Scourge! Why are you still here!? To Light's Hope! Yes
column2: you will be rewarded handsomely for your efforts...

column1: Fish Heads
column2: Fish Heads...^7^Horde^Eversong Woods^Hathvelion Sungaze^Hathvelion Sungaze^Fish Heads
column3: Fish Heads...^^^Collect 8 Grimscale Murloc Heads. Return them to Hathvelion Sungaze in the Eversong Woods on the bluff overlooking the Tranquil Shore.^Greetings
column4: <class>. Take a look toward the shore; what do you see? That's right
column5: our beach... our Tranquil Shore
column6: has been infested with the malignancy known as the murloc. This blight will not stand! I have a task for you. If you feel that you're up to it
column7: I would have their heads! Let us see if we can put a dent in their numbers so large that
column8: if they have any sense at all
column9: they will return to the murky depths from which they sprang!

column1: The Ring of Mmmrrrggglll^9^Horde^Eversong Woods^Hathvelion Sungaze^Hathvelion Sungaze^Fish Heads
column2: Fish Heads...^^^Retrieve the Ring of Mmmrrrggglll from the Grimscale chieftain's dead clutches. Return it to Hathvelion Sungaze in the Eversong Woods on the bluff overlooking the Tranquil Shore.^The Grimscale murlocs have not been scared off by your efforts. But
column3: I think I know what will send them packing
column4: as well as get me some personal retribution. They have a murloc chieftain that calls itself Mmmrrrggglll. It wanders the Golden Strand south of the river inlet. The beast once slew a compatriot of mine
column5: and now wears his ring in open defiance and mockery. Slay Mmmrrrggglll
column6: and bring back my friend's ring. Then we shall see these monsters cowed!

column1: Grimscale Pirates!^8^Horde^Eversong Woods^Captain Kelisendra^Captain Kelisendra^^^^Retrieve 6 of Captain Kelisendra's Cargo and return them to Captain Kelisendra at the defended camp just to the east of the Sunsail Anchorage in Eversong Woods.^Thank goodness for you
column2: <class>! Those slimy Grimscale murlocs have pirated away my cargo! It's bad enough that the Wretched have stolen what little magical goods I had
column3: but the murlocs took the rest! What has this land come to? Could you retrieve my cargo? I can't expect that you'd be able to get all of it back
column4: but I'll be grateful for any of it at this point. It was the Grimscale murlocs in the huts
column5: just to the west and south of the anchorage on the Golden Strand
column6: I'm sure of it!

column1: Captain Kelisendra's Lost Rutters^8^Horde^Eversong Woods^Captain Kelisendra's Lost Rutters^Captain Kelisendra^^^^Return Captain Kelisendra's Lost Rutters to Captain Kelisendra at the defended camp just to the east of the Sunsail Anchorage in Eversong Woods.^Interesting... what you have found here is a water-proofed
column2: leather tube containing a number of sheets of parchment. By the markings upon them
column3: the pages are clearly navigation rutters
column4: and each bears the signature of one Captain Kelisendra. You've heard of a small
column5: defended camp just east of the nearby Sunsail Anchorage. Maybe the captain is there?

column1: The Magister's Apprentice^10^Horde^Eversong Woods^Magister Duskwither^Apprentice Loralthalis^^^^Speak with Apprentice Loralthalis near Duskwither Spire in Eversong Woods.^<class>
column2: hear my request. For reasons that I cannot go into now
column3: I decided to shut down my nearby school. A few days ago
column4: I sent one of my pupils
column5: Apprentice Loralthalis
column6: there with this very task. I have not heard back from her since. Will you go to Duskwither Spire and check in on her
column7: to make sure that she is well? You'll find it by heading north on the path out of Farstrider Retreat
column8: then go to the right when the road branches.

column1: Deactivating the Spire^10^Horde^Eversong Woods^Apprentice Loralthalis^Apprentice Loralthalis^Deactivating the Spire^^^Deactivate the 3 Duskwither Spire Power Sources inside Duskwither Spire. Then return the Deactivating Jewel to Apprentice Loralthalis in Eversong Woods.^As you may know
column2: Magister Duskwither sent me back here to shut down the power sources that feed the Spire. There are three of them
column3: each located in a different place inside. Unfortunately
column4: I appear to be too late
column5: and Duskwither Spire has been overrun with strange
column6: magical creatures. While I haven't the expertise to accomplish this task
column7: surely a <class>
column8: such as yourself
column9: could do so easily?

column1: Word from the Spire^10^Horde^Eversong Woods^Apprentice Loralthalis^Magister Duskwither^Deactivating the Spire^^^Return to Magister Duskwither at the Farstrider Retreat in Eversong Woods.^<name>
column2: I have one last favor to ask of you. Would you please relay what's transpired here to Magister Duskwither
column3: back at the Farstrider Retreat? Let him know that I am well
column4: but make certain that he is aware that some of the apprentices have become Wretched. Thank you for your help!

column1: Abandoned Investigations^10^Horde^Eversong Woods^Magister Duskwither's Journal^Magister Duskwither^^^^Return Magister Duskwither's Journal to Magister Duskwither at the Farstrider Retreat in Eversong Woods.^You have discovered what appears to be an investigative journal left behind by Magister Duskwither. A brief scan of its contents reveal some shocking attempts at filtering corrupted magical flows
column2: which might explain what has happened here at Duskwither Spire. The magister is sure to want this brought back to him.

column1: Situation at Sunsail Anchorage^7^Horde^Eversong Woods^Ranger Degolien^Ranger Degolien^Fairbreeze Village^^Farstrider Retreat^Kill 5 Wretched Thugs and 5 Wretched Hooligans and report to Ranger Degolien in Eversong Woods.^Sunsail Anchorage has been overrun by Wretched scum. As soon as we manage to get reinforcements to the area we'll show those thugs who's boss
column2: <name>. In the meantime you can help by showing them a bit of discipline. Go in there and show them we are not to be trifled with. You will find Sunsail Anchorage just to the west of Fairbreeze Village.

column1: Cleaning up the Grounds^10^Horde^Eversong Woods^Groundskeeper Wyllithen^Groundskeeper Wyllithen^Where's Wyllithen?^^^Kill 6 Mana Serpents and 6 Ether Fiends and return to Groundskeeper Wyllithen at Duskwither Grounds in Eversong Woods.^It's horrible
column2: I tell you! Strange things happening in the spire
column3: the magister and his apprentices run off
column4: and then the next thing that you know
column5: the whole grounds are overrun with these magical beasties! And who told Wyllithen? No one
column6: that's who! <class>
column7: you've got to help me clear some of these things out... I cannot maintain the grounds while these 'anomalies' are running amok!

column1: Delivery to the North Sanctum^6^Horde^Eversong Woods^Magister Jaronis^Ley-Keeper Caidanis^Major Malfunction^^^Deliver the Unmarked Letter to Ley-Keeper Caidanis at the North Sanctum in Eversong Woods.^I'm pleased to discover that you're at least somewhat competent
column2: <name>. I'll give you another task since you seem so eager to prove yourself. This is a letter to Ley-Keeper Caidanis
column3: the arcanist in charge of the upkeep of the North Sanctum. Go southwest of Falconwing Square and you will find him. He is a very important person
column4: so I hope you don't bother him too much with trivial chatter.

column1: An Earnest Proposition^60^Alliance^Druid^Deliana^Deliana^^^A Supernatural Device^Acquire 15 Winterspring Blood Samples and 20 gold and bring them along with a set of Wildheart Bracers to Deliana in Ironforge.^Well met
column2: <class>. I've something that might interest you. I have in my possession a set of armor much like the one worn by those of your profession
column3: but of much higher quality. I'd be willing to trade the bracers for ordinary ones in exchange for a small favor. The blood of the frostsabers and bears that inhabit Winterspring has properties I'm in need of at the moment. Bring me a sizeable sample of it along with the bracers and a small amount of gold. You shall find the effort worth your while.

column1: An Earnest Proposition^60^Horde^Druid^Mokvar^Mokvar^^^A Supernatural Device^Acquire 15 Silithus Venom Samples and 20 gold and bring them along with a set of Wildheart Bracers to Mokvar in Orgrimmar.^Hail
column2: <class>! I can tell by your demeanor that you've seen and done much in this world. Yet I'm willing to wager you haven't seen a piece of armor like this. Perform a small favor for me and I'll be willing to trade it to you for an ordinary set of bracers. I'm in need of a sizeable sample of venom drawn from the spiders and scorpions that inhabit Silithus. Bring this to me along with a few gold coins and I'll perform the exchange.

column1: The Ectoplasmic Distiller^60^All^Tanaris^Mux Manascrambler^Mux Manascrambler^A Supernatural Device^^^Return to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan with 1 Delicate Arcanite Converter
column2: 4 Greater Eternal Essence
column3: 10 Stonescale Oil
column4: 25 Volcanic Ash and 40 gold.^Ah
column5: you're in need of my latest project... the extra-dimensional ghost revealer! Unfortunately I've run out of funds and manpower. You're willing to help? Excellent! Our first task is to build a device to harvest the very fabric of death! Building an ectoplasmic distiller won't be an easy task
column6: <name>. I'll need you to bring me an arcanite converter
column7: some greater eternal essences and stonescale oil. I'll also need some volcanic ash from the lava pools in the Burning Steppes to build a filter.

column1: A Supernatural Device^60^Alliance^Tanaris^Deliana^Mux Manascrambler^A Supernatural Device^^The Ectoplasmic Distiller^Bring the Sealed Blood Container to Mux Manascrambler inside Gadgetzan in Tanaris.^I must find a way to speak with Anthion Harmon... or more specifically
column2: his ghost! I know of an engineer with a queer interest in the supernatural. He claims he can build a machine that allows him to speak with the dead! The blood you collected was intended for him; travel to Gadgetzan and bring it to him as payment for his services!

column1: A Supernatural Device^60^Horde^Tanaris^Mokvar^Mux Manascrambler^A Supernatural Device^^The Ectoplasmic Distiller^Take the Sealed Venom Container to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan.^You must be quite brave to have stuck around after that. That or I've piqued your interest with the piece of armor I gave you. There is more from where that came from
column2: if you're still interested in aiding me. The venom samples you collected are for an acquaintance of mine
column3: Mux Manascrambler
column4: an engineer with an interest in the supernatural. His latest project consists of a device that allows you to communicate with the dead! My last hope is to contact Anthion and find out more about my situation.

column1: Hunting for Ectoplasm^60^All^Tanaris^Mux Manascrambler^Mux Manascrambler^A Supernatural Device^^^Use the Ectoplasmic Distiller near incorporeal undead to collect 12 Scorched Ectoplasms in Silithus
column2: 12 Frozen Ectoplasms in Winterspring and 12 Stable Ectoplasms in the Eastern Plaguelands. Bring them along with the Ectoplasmic Distiller back to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan.^A fine piece of engineering
column3: if I do say so myself! You will need to travel a bit
column4: I'm afraid
column5: in order to find the incorporeal undead we require. You see
column6: different climates lend different consistencies to the spectral fabric of the dead. The tortured night elves of Silithus
column7: the spirits of the highborne from Winterspring and the ghosts and banshees of the Eastern Plaguelands should give us the different types of ectoplasm we need. Be sure to place the distiller nearby before you harvest them!

column1: A Portable Power Source^60^All^Tanaris^Mux Manascrambler^Mux Manascrambler^A Supernatural Device^^^Find Magma Lord Bokk in the Burning Steppes
column2: obtain his Magma Core and bring it to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan.^Next we shall need to find a stable and portable source of energy to keep the ectoplasm active. I've heard rumors of a mighty elemental called Magma Lord Bokk
column3: whose heart is a powerful magma core - an endless supply of heat! It's said he can be found in the Burning Steppes
column4: south of Blackrock Mountain. Bring the magma core to me and we shall have enough juice to power the extra-dimensional ghost revealer!

column1: Just Compensation^60^Alliance^Druid^Deliana^Deliana^Just Compensation^Return to Deliana^In Search of Anthion^Bring a Wildheart Belt and a set of Wildheart Gloves Deliana in Ironforge.^You kept your word and brought the device built by Mux. I believe a reward is in order if I'm to keep you interested in saving my skin. Bring me the belt and set of gloves that you wish to upgrade. I promise the ones I give you in return will be far superior.

Just Compensation^60^Horde^Druid^Mokvar^Mokvar^Just Compensation^Return to Mokvar^In Search of Anthion^Bring a Wildheart Belt and a set of Wildheart Gloves to Mokvar in Orgrimmar.^You've proven to be a very reliable individual
column2: <name>. As much as I trust that you'll help me through this predicament
column3: it would be wise of me to reward you according to your performance. For now I will exchange your belt and gloves. If we both see this through I shall make the rest of the pieces available to you.

column1: A Shifty Merchant^60^All^Tanaris^Mux Manascrambler^Mux Manascrambler^A Supernatural Device^^Return to Deliana
column2: Return to Mokvar^Search for an imp inside a cave at the entrance of Darkwhisper Gorge in southern Winterspring
column3: purchase a Fel Elemental Rod and return to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan.^The core will provide us with enough juice to power our device; now we just have to build a rod that can channel that energy without melting. I met an imp in Winterspring that sold all manner of exotic goods. He had an elemental rod that would do perfectly. I'm kicking myself in the head right now for not having bought it. He lives inside a cave in the entrance to Darkwhisper Gorge. Sneak in there and try to find him. Make sure he only charges you forty gold; that's the price he quoted me!

column1: In Search of Anthion^60^Alliance^Eastern Plaguelands^Deliana^Anthion Harmon^Just Compensation^^Dead Man's Plea^Use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer at the entrance to Stratholme and speak with the ghost of Anthion Harmon.^Well
column2: nothing left for us to do but try out the goblin's invention. Word has it that Anthion was mowed down by the undead legions of Stratholme as he tried to enter its gates. Try using the device there and find out whatever Anthion knew.

column1: In Search of Anthion^60^Horde^Eastern Plaguelands^Mokvar^Anthion Harmon^Just Compensation^^Dead Man's Plea^Use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer at the entrance to Stratholme and speak with the ghost of Anthion Harmon.^Very well

column3: indeed
column4: you can speak with the dead!

column1: Dead Man's Plea^60^All^Stratholme^Anthion Harmon^Ysida Harmon^Just Compensation^^^Go into Stratholme and rescue Ysida Harmon from Baron Rivendare.^I'll provide you the information you ask for
column2: <name>. But more pressing matters are at hand. My beloved wife has been taken prisoner by Rivendare's undead scum. I strongly objected to her joining the Argent Dawn's foolish crusade
column3: yet that's not of importance anymore. You must finish what I attempted to do
column4: you must rescue Ysida from the clutches of the Baron!

column1: Proof of Life^60^All^Eastern Plaguelands^Ysida Harmon^Anthion Harmon^Just Compensation^^^Bring Ysida's Locket to Anthion Harmon in Eastern Plaguelands.^It is the cruelest of fates that my beloved has perished while trying to rescue me. Yet
column2: you claim to possess the ability to converse with him. Bring him this locket as proof that I am well. He must not linger in this world; my heart would not be able to bear it. Farewell
column3: <name>. I shall be in your debt always.

column1: Anthion's Strange Request^60^All^Eastern Plaguelands^Anthion Harmon^Anthion Harmon^Just Compensation^^^Bring 3 Dark Iron Bars
column2: 20 Enchanted Leather
column3: 3 Mooncloth and 4 Cured Rugged Hides to Anthion Harmon in the Eastern Plaguelands.^We didn't realize the importance of Valthalak's medallion
column4: so it was divided along with the rest of the spoils. The first piece was taken by a dwarf named Theldren. I tried to retrieve it from him and he beat me within an inch of my life. You shall have to take the fragment by force. Last I heard of him
column5: he'd become a gladiator for the Dark Iron dwarves. Getting him to fight you is going to present a bit of a challenge
column6: though. Gather the following materials for me. You're going to need them.

column1: Anthion's Old Friend^60^All^Dire Maul^Anthion Harmon^Falrin Treeshaper^Just Compensation^^^Take the incomplete Banner of Provocation to Falrin Treeshaper at the library in Dire Maul.^Theldren is not one to willingly participate in a fair fight. I've shaped this banner to display his family colors. With some additional sorcery
column2: this banner shall provoke him in a way he won't be able to resist. An old acquaintance of mine named Falrin knows the exact procedure required. He has a particular way of... aggravating people. You shall find him at the library in Dire Maul.

column1: Falrin's Vendetta^60^All^Dire Maul^Falrin Treeshaper^Falrin Treeshaper^Just Compensation^^^Collect 25 Ogre Warbeads from Ogres inside Dire Maul or Blackrock Spire and return to Falrin Treeshaper inside the Athenaeum in Dire Maul.^Yes
column2: it is true that I am familiar with this enchantment you require
column3: <class>. Yet I'm not one to give out favors freely
column4: even if you were sent here by an old friend. I hold nothing but hatred and contempt for our brutish ogre neighbors. And not only them
column5: I hate the followers of Omokk just as much as I hate those that follow King Gordok. I want you to kill them. Kill lots of them! Bring me the beads they carry around their neck as proof of your work. Do this and we shall talk about your request.

column1: The Instigator's Enchantment^60^All^Dire Maul^Falrin Treeshaper^Falrin Treeshaper^Just Compensation^^The Challenge^Bring the following to Falrin Treeshaper inside Dire Maul: 1 Jeering Spectre's Essence
column2: 4 Dark Runes and 8 Large Brilliant Shards.^I can place the enchantment you require on the banner quite easily
column3: <name>. Unfortunately I don't have the materials I need as it is very rarely that someone asks for this sort of charm. I will require the essence of one of the Eldreth ghosts that haunt these halls
column4: a handful of Scholomance dark runes and some large brilliant shards. Bring me these reagents and I shall perform this task for you.

column1: Anthion's Parting Words^60^Alliance^Druid^Anthion Harmon^Deliana^Anthion's Parting Words^The Challenge^Bodley's Unfortunate Fate^Return to Deliana in Ironforge with a set of Wildheart Boots
column2: a Wildheart Kilt and Wildheart Spaulders.^Valthalak's soul was stored in this amulet. In our greed we foolishly split it into three parts
column3: not knowing the curse that would await us. The only way to stop Valthalak's spell is to put the medallion back together. Return to Deliana and tell her that Bodley is her only hope for finding the remaining pieces. Speak to her about any rewards you've arranged for. I
column4: for once
column5: shall rest in peace. I wish you the best of luck; you shall need every bit of it!

column1: Bodley's Unfortunate Fate^60^Alliance^Blackrock Mountain^Deliana^Bodley^Anthion's Parting Words^^Three Kings of Flame^Travel to Blackrock Mountain and use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer to find Bodley near Blackrock Spire.^So we need to recover the rest of the medallion? Finding Bodley's going to be a bit of a headache. He went back to Blackrock Mountain to attempt to re-enter Blackrock Spire and never came back. I'd suggest taking the goblin's ghost revealing device with you
column2: as I fear the worst might have happened.

column1: Three Kings of Flame^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^Anthion's Parting Words^^Components of Importance
column2: Components of Importance
column3: Components of Importance
column4: Components of Importance^Gather the Incendicite of Incendius
column5: the Ember of Emberseer and the Cinder of Cynders
column6: along with a Hallowed Brazier
column7: and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^In order to summon Lord Valthalak we're first going to need to gather the other two-thirds of the amulet. To do that we need to get a brazier and some special coals to burn in it. There are three nobles of fire
column8: Lord Incedius in Blackrock Depths
column9: Pyroguard Emberseer in Blackrock Spire and The Duke of Cynders in Silithus
column10: with what we need. Collect from each a piece of their remains
column11: and then return to me with a Hallowed Brazier
column12: which can be purchased from the Argent Dawn if you are honored by them.

column1: Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^Three Kings of Flame^More Components of Importance^Acquire Druidical Remains and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the brazier
column3: and the means to light it
column4: we still need another component to suffuse it with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to entice the spirit of my deceased
column5: former comrade. Mor Grayhoof
column6: our most prominent druid
column7: had many close friends amongst the Cenarion Circle
column8: some of which have fallen to the silithid. I need you to retrieve some Druidical Remains from the silithid that inhabit the environs of Hive'Regal in southeastern Silithus.

column1: Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^Three Kings of Flame^More Components of Importance^Acquire a Starbreeze Village Relic and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the brazier
column3: and the means to light it
column4: we still need another component to suffuse it with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to entice the spirit of my deceased
column5: former comrade. Isalien
column6: our priestess
column7: grew up in Winterspring at Starbreeze Village. I need you to gather a Starbreeze Village Relic from the Frostmaul giants of Frostwhisper Gorge in southern Winterspring
column8: who are known for raiding to the north from time to time.

column1: Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^Three Kings of Flame^More Components of Importance^Retrieve a Brilliant Sword of Zealotry and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the brazier
column3: and the means to light it
column4: we still need another component to suffuse it with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to summon the remains of my deceased
column5: former comrades. The siblings
column6: Jarien and Sothos
column7: were believers in the way of the Scarlet Crusade. They aspired to knighthood within that vile organization. Go to Tyr's Hand in Eastern Plaguelands and retrieve a Brilliant Sword of Zealotry from the praetorians there.

column1: Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^Three Kings of Flame^More Components of Importance^Obtain Soul Ashes of the Banished and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the brazier
column3: and the means to light it
column4: we still need another component to suffuse it with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to entice the spirit of my deceased
column5: former comrade. An ogre necromancer that traveled with us
column6: Kormok
column7: delighted in summoning forth the souls of the banished dead of Purgation Isle
column8: off the south coast of the Hillsbrad Foothills. Go there and retrieve some Soul Ashes of the Banished from their remains.

column1: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Blackrock Spire^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Mor Grayhoof and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^My friend
column2: Mor Grayhoof
column3: was the first to fall victim to possession of a piece of Lord Valthalak's amulet
column4: and the corrupting spirit fragment that it contains. After stealing Valthalak's spellbook and amulet
column5: we fled for our lives from the upper portion of Blackrock Spire. Along the way
column6: Mor fell into the lower portion of the spire. Later
column7: we discovered that he survived the fall
column8: only to be captured and tortured by War Master Voone. A few spectral assassins snuck in and slew him right in front of Voone.

column1: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Dire Maul^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Isalien and slay her. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^It became known to us in later days
column2: as we were doing what we could ourselves to survive
column3: that Isalien
column4: a night elf priestess of our company
column5: had gone to the night elvic ancestral city
column6: now known as Dire Maul. From what we gathered
column7: she went there both for personal reasons and also to unlock the secrets of the piece of the amulet that she had in her possession. She didn't quite make it
column8: though. Word got back to us that she was ambushed at the Shrine of Eldretharr by Alzzin the Wildshaper and his forces.

column1: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Stratholme^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth Jarien and Sothos and slay them. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^The siblings
column2: Jarien and Sothos
column3: decided to join the Scarlet Crusade upon the disbanding of our mercenary company. They took the left piece of Lord Valthalak's amulet with them. Good riddance
column4: I say
column5: but we need that piece back. From what we could gather
column6: they were actually slain by Grand Crusader Dathrohan himself for failing the initiation rites inside his chamber in the Scarlet Bastion. In any case
column7: we... meaning you
column8: are still going to need to retrieve that piece of the amulet.

column1: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Scholomance^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Kormok and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^Now we have what we need
column2: so it's time to discuss who it is that you'll be summoning. Kormok was ok for an ogre
column3: right up until he turned to necromancy. After that
column4: things got creepy for just about everyone in the outfit. It was no surprise then when he took his piece of the amulet and returned to his new home
column5: Scholomance. But even there
column6: or perhaps especially there
column7: he was not safe from the spectral assassins. They slew him right in front of his master
column8: Ras Frostwhisper.

column1: I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...^60^All^Burning Steppes^Bodley^Bodley^Components of Importance^^More Components of Importance
column2: More Components of Importance
column3: More Components of Importance
column4: More Components of Importance^Gather 20 Bloodkelp from the Strashaz naga and then return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^As I was saying
column5: <class>
column6: in my living years I flirted with becoming a diviner. But
column7: there really wasn't as much profit in it as you might imagine
column8: mostly because it's dangerous and the reagents are rare and expensive. However
column9: I do know enough to be able to pinpoint the final piece of the amulet
column10: and the spirit of my former comrade along with it. This is where you come in
column11: <name>. I need you to go to Alcaz Island off the coast of Dustwallow Marsh and collect Bloodkelp from the Strashaz naga that live there.

column9: Just Compensation^Return to Mokvar in Orgrimmar with the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer.^It's been great working with you
column10: <name>. Here is the finished product. I hope it helps you in your current endeavors. And hey
column11: if you don't mind
column12: help spread the word. I wouldn't mind having more customers!

column1: More Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...Requires one ofComponents of Importance^^Acquire a Starbreeze Village Relic and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the location of the last amulet piece
column3: we still need another component to suffuse the brazier with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to entice the spirit of my deceased
column4: former comrade. Isalien
column5: our priestess
column6: grew up in Winterspring at Starbreeze Village. I need you to gather a Starbreeze Village Relic from the Frostmaul giants of Frostwhisper Gorge in southern Winterspring
column7: who are known for raiding to the north from time to time.

column1: More Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...Requires one ofComponents of Importance^^Acquire Druidical Remains and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the location of the last amulet piece
column3: we still need another component to suffuse the brazier with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to entice the spirit of my deceased
column4: former comrade. Mor Grayhoof
column5: our most prominent druid
column6: had many close friends amongst the Cenarion Circle
column7: some of which have fallen to the silithid. I need you to retrieve some Druidical Remains from the silithid that inhabit the environs of Hive'Regal in southeastern Silithus.

column1: More Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...Requires one ofComponents of Importance^^Retrieve a Brilliant Sword of Zealotry and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the location of the last amulet piece
column3: we still need another component to suffuse the brazier with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to summon the remains of my deceased
column4: former comrades. The siblings
column5: Jarien and Sothos
column6: were believers in the way of the Scarlet Crusade. They aspired to knighthood within that vile organization. Go to Tyr's Hand in Eastern Plaguelands and retrieve a Brilliant Sword of Zealotry from the praetorians there.

column1: More Components of Importance^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^I See Alcaz Island In Your Future...Requires one ofComponents of Importance^^Obtain Soul Ashes of the Banished and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^<class>
column2: listen closely. Now that we have the location of the last amulet piece
column3: we still need another component to suffuse the brazier with; something that will provide a focus strong enough to entice the spirit of my deceased
column4: former comrade. An ogre necromancer that traveled with us
column5: Kormok
column6: delighted in summoning forth the souls of the banished dead of Purgation Isle
column7: off the south coast of the Hillsbrad Foothills. Go there and retrieve some Soul Ashes of the Banished from their remains.

column1: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Blackrock Spire^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^^Final Preparations^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Mor Grayhoof and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^My friend
column2: Mor Grayhoof
column3: was the first to fall victim to possession of a piece of Lord Valthalak's amulet
column4: and the corrupting spirit fragment that it contains. After stealing Valthalak's spellbook and amulet
column5: we fled for our lives from the upper portion of Blackrock Spire. Along the way
column6: Mor fell into the lower portion of the spire. Later
column7: we discovered that he survived the fall
column8: only to be captured and tortured by War Master Voone. A few spectral assassins snuck in and slew him right in front of Voone.

column1: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Dire Maul^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^^Final Preparations^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Isalien and slay her. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^It became known to us in later days
column2: as we were doing what we could ourselves to survive
column3: that Isalien
column4: a night elf priestess of our company
column5: had gone to the night elvic ancestral city
column6: now known as Dire Maul. From what we gathered
column7: she went there both for personal reasons and also to unlock the secrets of the piece of the amulet that she had in her possession. She didn't quite make it
column8: though. Word got back to us that she was ambushed at the Shrine of Eldretharr by Alzzin the Wildshaper and his forces.

column1: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Stratholme^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^^Final Preparations^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth Jarien and Sothos and slay them. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^The siblings
column2: Jarien and Sothos
column3: decided to join the Scarlet Crusade upon the disbanding of our mercenary company. They took the right piece of Lord Valthalak's amulet with them. Good riddance
column4: I say
column5: but we need that piece back. From what we could gather
column6: they were actually slain by Grand Crusader Dathrohan himself for failing the initiation rites inside his chamber in the Scarlet Bastion. In any case
column7: we... meaning you
column8: are still going to need to retrieve that piece of the amulet.

column1: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet^60^All^Scholomance^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^^Final Preparations^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Kormok and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.^Now we have what we need
column2: so it's time to discuss who it is that you'll be summoning next. Kormok was ok for an ogre
column3: right up until he turned to necromancy. After that
column4: things got creepy for just about everyone in the outfit. It was no surprise then when he took his piece of the amulet and returned to his new home
column5: Scholomance. But even there
column6: or perhaps especially there
column7: he was not safe from the spectral assassins. They slew him right in front of his master
column8: Ras Frostwhisper.

column1: Final Preparations^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Bodley^Bodley^More Components of Importance^^^Gather 40 Blackrock Bracers and acquire a Flask of Supreme Power. Return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.^We're nearly there
column2: <class>. All that is left is to retrieve a few more components so that I can attune the brazier and enable it to beckon forth Lord Valthalak. To begin I must ask you to journey forth into Blackrock Spire and slay the orcs therein. They wear bracers that contain trace metals that I will need
column3: so I'll need more than a few to extract the right amount out of them. Then
column4: to complete the imbuing process
column5: you'll need to bring me a Flask of Supreme Power. Good luck
column6: <name>!

column1: Mea Culpa
column2: Lord Valthalak^60^All^Blackrock Spire^Bodley^Spirit of Lord Valthalak^More Components of Importance^^^Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon Lord Valthalak. Dispatch him
column3: and use Lord Valthalak's Amulet on the corpse. Then
column4: return Lord Valthalak's Amulet to the Spirit of Lord Valthalak.^All is now ready
column5: <name>. When alive
column6: Lord Valthalak used to inhabit what is now The Beast's chamber. Go there and use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth Lord Valthalak. It will reincorporate him
column7: so he'll have to be killed again. I'd take care of The Beast first
column8: and be sure take enough friends along to survive the upper portion of Blackrock Spire. Once you've dispatched Valthalak
column9: use the amulet on his corpse. With his spirit reunified
column10: he'll likely want his amulet back
column11: as well. Good luck!

column1: Return to Bodley^60^All^Blackrock Mountain^Spirit of Lord Valthalak^Bodley^More Components of Importance^^Back to the Beginning
column2: Back to the Beginning^Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain and give him the Brazier of Beckoning.^I will ignore your impertinence this time
column3: <class>
column4: because you have done a noble thing today; returning the rest of my stolen spirit to me. Despite your obviously weak nature
column5: <race>
column6: you have shown courage where those that stole from me did not
column7: and probably never could! Return to them
column8: before I change my mind and slay you where you stand. Go back and tell them that they are safe... for now.

column1: Anthion's Parting Words^60^Horde^Druid^Anthion Harmon^Mokvar^Anthion's Parting Words^The Challenge^Bodley's Unfortunate Fate^Return to Mokvar in Orgimmar with a set of Wildheart Boots
column2: a Wildheart Kilt and Wildheart Spaulders.^Valthalak's soul was stored in this amulet. In our greed we foolishly split it into three parts
column3: not knowing the curse that would await us. The only way to stop Valthalak's spell is to put the amulet back together. Return to Mokvar and tell him that Bodley is his only hope for finding the remaining pieces. Speak to him about any rewards you've arranged for. I
column4: for once
column5: shall rest in peace. I wish you the best of luck; you shall need every bit of it!
